metadata.title: CVE-2015-3832 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Multiple buffer overflows in MPEG4Extractor.cpp in libstagefright inAndroid before 5.1.1 LMY48I allow remote attackers to execute arbitrarycode via invalid size values of NAL units in MP4 data, aka internal bug19641538.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
